tweets.text: “It appears that an American spy in one of our intelligence agencies may have been spying on our own president. The complaint suggests that this intel agent was listening in on Trump’s conversation....

So interesting to see “Progressive” Democrat Congresswomen, who originally came from countries whose governments are a complete and total catastrophe, the worst, most corrupt and inept anywhere in the world (if they even have a functioning government at all, now loudly.....
Sorry losers and haters, but my I.Q. is one of the highest -and you all know it! Please don"t feel so stupid or insecure,it"s not your fault

....Knowing all of this, is anybody dumb enough to believe that I would say something inappropriate with a foreign leader while on such a potentially “heavily populated” call. I would only do what is right anyway, and only do good for the USA!
We are one people, with one destiny. We all bleed the same blood. We all salute the same flag. And we are all made by the same God.
Nobody should be allowed to burn the American flag - if they do, there must be consequences - perhaps loss of citizenship or year in jail!
How amazing, the State Health Director who verified copies of Obama’s “birth certificate” died in plane crash today. All others lived
Any negative polls are fake news, just like the CNN, ABC, NBC polls in the election. Sorry, people want border security and extreme vetting.
It"s freezing and snowing in New York--we need global warming!

....The Prime Minister was able to save a great deal of expense and effort for both the United States and Denmark by being so direct. I thank her for that and look forward to rescheduling sometime in the future!
